title: Well Ghostcrawler actually did it

embed.description: Years of conversation fill a ton of digital pages, and we've kept all of it accessible to browse or copy over. Whether you're looking for reveal articles for older champions, or the first time that Rammus rolled into an "OK" thread, or anything in between, you can find it here.

body:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4190291

I'm not OP of the post but god how he was right.

I just watched some season 3 videos and I even cried how good and enjoyable was this game before. How it's even possible to turn the whole game into skirmish clownfiesta?

replies.body: Hashinshin on this thread was so positive and a cheerful lad. Then the fire nation attacked

> [{quoted}](name=AÏnz  Ooal  Gown,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7587kUv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-25T10:56:39.029+0000)
>
> Hashinshin on this thread was so positive and a cheerful lad. Then the fire nation attacked

According to him, he stopped being mad recently because he's now "dead inside". But he does seem to rage less tho.
GC is no longer a part of the gameplay design team. So?
Big fucking deal if he "Done fucked it up!" before he left.

> [{quoted}](name=Thé Nut,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=m7587kUv,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-08-25T11:05:55.141+0000)
>
> Big fucking deal if he "Done fucked it up!" before he left.

He's now a part of Riot's creative team, so he didn't leave but had a change of department.
